ygData.subject: Re: Slaughter and the Dark Avian/ Wild Ride
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Well, I m not really saying that the defenses can t detect Slaughter, but signature-seeking missiles wouldn t get him, cause he s not a robot, he s

OOC: Well, I'm not really saying that the defenses can't detect Slaughter, =
but signature-seeking missiles wouldn't get him, 'cause he's not a robot, h=
e's completely organic.  So, you can post the defenses coming up against Sl=
aughter if you want to.

IC: Quatro saw the defense turrets start firing at=
 him.  A blasr hit him, but his special metal absorbed the damage.  Quatro'=
s back opened up and revealed a jet pack.  The plasma cannons and missile l=
aunchers went back into Quatro as he flew up into the air.  Quatro acrobati=
cally dodged the shots from the defenses.  He flew higher and higher into t=
he air, until he could see almost all of the base.  Then, he flew to the ot=
her side, and landed, near the entrance, moving quickly and silently.  Quat=
ro activated his stealth mode(also known as cloaking or invisibilty) and sn=
uck into the base.  Somebody, or something(Slaughter) had left the entrance=
 open for him.  

       Quatro started walking around the base freely, as =
he was cloaked.  He saw bots and even saw Slaughter, but didn't do anything=
, and was minding his own robot's oil(bee's wax, robot's oil, get it?  Ok i=
t sucks but who cares!).  Quatro headed to the control room, and looked at =
the, well, controls and stuff.  Then, Quatro decided to spy and get informa=
tion.

        From his forehand, came out a stiff, wire thingy.  Quatro lo=
oked around for a little socket, then saw it.  He stuck the wire thingy in =
it.  Then, a list of options appeared in Quatro's mind.  Quatro did some fu=
nky stuff with his technologically-advanced body and mind, and was then abl=
e to see everywhere inside the base.  He saw Slaughter going to attack Squa=
wktalk, who was giving Cepta a tour.  He saw two other bots inside the base=
 as well(forgot their names.)  It was almost as if Quatro was controlling a=
n invisible camera which could move around everywhere, with his mind.  Quat=
ro could even see an area around the outside of the base.

       But, that=
 wasn't what Quatro needed.  He did some more funky stuff, and he could the=
n see a list of all the Decepticons(not the Neo Decepticons) and could view=
 bios on them, and see their stats.  And guess which one he wanted to look =
at?  Yep, Megatron's.  Quatro read some history and then read about Megatro=
n in the present.  Quatro decided he had enough from there, so he disconnec=
ted the wire thingy and it went back into his forehand.  Now, he had to get=
 in contact with Megatron soon.  But not yet...Quatro kept exploring the co=
ntrol room, looking for things that might be useful.
  
         After that=
, Quatro found the nearest vent, then opened it and went up, then was sure =
to close the vent again so nobody could see that he went up.  And from ther=
e, he crawled around, trying to listen in on things.
  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: robertdahl 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday,=
 May 06, 2001 12:55 PM
  Subject: Re: Slaughter and the Dark Avian/ Wild Ri=
de


  Wildrider looked down at Symphony, and started to laugh. He then lif=
ted
  his head up from behind cover, and looked around. He realised what wa=
s
  going on, "Symphony, pmhahh, you stay here and give me cover fire on
  =
that robot" he said, pointing towards Incarcinerator. He jumped up past
  t=
he hill, and transformed, hitting the ground with a tire wrenching
  250mph=
 squeal, and roared towards his comerades.


  OOC: So Dcoburn, Slaughter c=
an't be detected by defense systems?

  BIC:
  As soon as Quatro launched h=
is attack, eight hiddent laser turrets
  extended out of the ground. They e=
ach then displayed four laser cannons,
  and began to all spin. Each time o=
ne made a revolution, it would fire
  towards Quatro. (Your in over your he=
ad)

  Quatro's fire power passed the turrets, and nailed the base, charrin=
g
  the side. Luckily they hit the heavily armored side of the base.

     =
   Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is s=
ubject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
